recipesJson.name: Crunched
recipesJson.author: Deweysuds
recipesJson.description: A delicious honey almond crunch cereal.  Needs about a week steep for everything to come together

reviews.text: Thanks for sharing, great recipe, tastes just like crunchy nut corn flakes!

I really like this, even though I don't quite know how to describe it.  It's almost a sweet tobacco and a dark-grain cereal with the slightest hint of milkiness.  Whatever it is, it's pretty damn good.
